body.name: Projector with Wifi and Bluetooth 2024 Upgraded Model, CoolEeve TV Video Portable Projector 1080P 16000L, Outdoor Indoor Mini Projector for Home Theater, Compatible with iOS/ Android/TV Stick/HDMI
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 14. Order within 8 hrs 27 mins
features: 📽️【Projector with Wifi and Bluetooth】 CoolEeve projector with wifi and bluetooth, You can use your phone to mirror cast the screen, you can do other operations on your phone normally while casting the screen, it's more convenient for you to use, and the bluetooth can conect to other audio devices, allowing you to independently choose a better source of sound！

📽️【14000Lumens Hd Upgraded Projector】CoolEeve projection has a native resolution of 1920*1080 and 14000 Lumens for sharper, adopted the latest color reproduction technology, every details on the screen is accurately restored to ensure a real and color-vibrant viewing effect.

📽️【Best Sound Quality & Self-Contained Speaker】 CoolEeve adopting the latest Bluetooth 5.1 technology, relax yourself in a private space, get the happiness by connecting the speaker. Self-contained speaker preservation the original sound, just enjoy it!

📽️【Multi-Device Connection】 CoolEeve portable projector support multi device connection, support iOS, Android, windows, USB, HDMI, VGA, AV, TV Stick to let you choose. And support wifi and wired connection for screen casting.

📽️【2 Year Warranty Service】 CoolEeve team provide you a high-quality products and 2 year warranty service, please rest assured! Projector support multi lay way to convenient for you to watch, front, rear, and ceiling cast. Just enjoy your fun home theater!

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 5.0 5.0 out of 5 stars 23 ratings 5.0 out of 5 stars

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Bringing your world to life, one projection at a time! Introducing our state-of-the-art projector, designed to bring your presentations, movies, and games to life with stunning clarity and vibrant colors. Our projector features high-resolution display, easy connectivity options, and advanced image processing technology, ensuring a seamless and immersive viewing experience. Whether you're in a boardroom, classroom, or home theater, our projector is the perfect companion for all your visual needs. Say goodbye to dull and blurry projections, and say hello to the future of visual excellence. Upgrade to our projector today and see the difference for yourself.

Our projector offers versatile installation options to suit your specific needs. Whether you prefer desktop mounting for easy access and portability, ceiling mounting for a streamlined and space-saving setup, or bracket mounting for a secure and stable display, our projector can be effortlessly configured to accommodate your preferred installation method. With its adaptable design, you have the flexibility to customize the placement of the projector to best suit your environment, ensuring a seamless and optimized viewing experience. Enjoy the convenience and freedom to install our projector in the manner that best fits your requirements!

CoolEeve cutting-edge projector with built-in WiFi and Bluetooth capabilities. With seamless wireless connectivity, you can easily stream content from your smartphone, tablet, or laptop, eliminating the hassle of tangled cables. The WiFi feature allows for effortless access to online content, while the Bluetooth connectivity enables convenient pairing with external speakers or other devices. Enjoy the freedom to project your favorite media with ease and convenience, making this projector the perfect choice for modern presentations, entertainment, and more. Experience the next level of versatility and connectivity with our WiFi and Bluetooth-enabled projector.

CoolEeve versatile projector is the ultimate companion for a wide range of activities and events. Whether you're hosting an outdoor sports viewing party, enjoying a movie night under the stars, or giving a professional presentation at work, our projector is the perfect solution. Its portable design makes it easy to take anywhere, while its high-quality display ensures crisp and clear images in any setting. Additionally, it makes an ideal gift for friends and family who appreciate the latest in entertainment technology. With its ability to adapt to various usage scenarios, our projector is the go-to choice for all your projection needs!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Home Theater Upgrade
reviews.reviewText: I upgraded my home theater with this projector, and it's been an amazing experience. The WiFi and Bluetooth capabilities make it incredibly versatile. I can easily mirror my phone's screen and continue using my phone while casting. The Bluetooth connection to external audio devices enhances the sound quality. The image quality is sharp and vibrant, providing a good viewing experience. The built-in speaker is great, but I love the option to connect to my sound system for a more immersive audio experience. Its compatibility with multiple devices and connectivity options makes it a flexible choice for all my entertainment needs. This projector is a great addition for anyone looking to elevate their viewing experience at home.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars saves the day
reviews.reviewText: Picture this: it's movie night, and we're all set for a cozy evening. But, horror of horrors, the TV decides it needs a break. Enter the mini projector with WiFi and Bluetooth – our knight in shining armor. No cords, no tech tantrums, just smooth sailing. We synced it with our devices via Bluetooth in a snap and streamed our favorite flick with the WiFi wizardry. It turned our living room into an instant home theater.The compact size makes it easy to set up anywhere, and the picture quality is surprisingly top-notch. It was like having a cinematic experience right in our humble abode. Plus, the Bluetooth connection meant we could pump up the volume with our external speakers, turning the movie night into a full-on sensory delight. The remote control is a lazy person's dream – no getting up to adjust anything. It saved the day and turned a potential TV disaster into one of our best movie nights ever.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Enjoy movie fun at home
reviews.reviewText: My family recently got a new projector and it's been an absolute blast. It's incredibly easy to use, with setup taking less than 2 minutes to figure out. The sound quality was impressive and enhanced our movie-watching experience. The projector itself is surprisingly light and can be moved between rooms easily. It comes with a convenient remote control, adding to its convenience. The projector's sleek design not only functions well but adds a modern aesthetic to our space. The resolution and image quality are excellent, providing a lifelike and immersive home theater experience. Its powerful brightness and contrast provide clear and vivid images, day or night, perfect for our spare bedroom or living room. This projector truly brings the magic of movies into our homes

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Impressive 1080P Projector with nice Features!
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the 1080P 12000 Lumens Portable Movie Video Mini Projector, and it has exceeded my expectations in every aspect. Setting up the projector is easy, and its portability adds to its appeal. The 12000 lumens provide a bright and sharp image, even in well-lit rooms. The native resolution of 1920*1080, coupled with support for up to 4K resolution, delivers stunning clarity and detail. The latest color reproduction technology ensures a vibrant and true-to-life viewing experience, making every detail on the screen pop.One standout feature is the projector's Bluetooth 5.1 technology. Connecting external speakers is a breeze, allowing me to create a private audio. The self-contained speaker delivers impeccable sound quality, preserving the original audio for an immersive viewing and listening experience. It's a game-changer for movie nights or gaming sessions.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: We are satisfied with this item. It performs well and is easy to use. It is quiet while operating. It is easy to connect to my phone and easy to control. I also use it in my presentation, and the quality of the picture is good, very clear, and bright.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars undoubtedly an ideal choice.
reviews.reviewText: This projector has a native resolution of 1920*1080 and a brightness of up to 14000 lumens, presenting a clearer and sharper image. With the latest color reproduction technology, every detail on the screen is accurately reproduced, ensuring a realistic and vibrant viewing experience. For users who seek high image quality, this projector is undoubtedly an ideal choice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The standout feature for me is the massive 30-300 inches screen, providing an immersive and happiness-inducing movie time. The ±15 degree keystone correction ensures a perfectly adjusted screen, enhancing the overall viewing experience.What sets this projector apart is its incredible multi-device connectivity. Whether you're using iOS, Android, Windows, USB, HDMI, or a TV Stick, This Projector has you covered. The flexibility to support both wifi and wired connections for screen casting adds convenience and versatility.Setting up the projector is a breeze, and the image quality is outstanding with 1080P resolution and 12000 lumens brightness. It's truly a portable powerhouse that brings entertainment to life.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This entertainment set is actually crazy! It's wireless which flips the script on cable – no more cable wrestling or tech support drama just to stream a movie. And Bluetooth? It's like a bonus round – seamless speaker connections make my movie nights feel like I'm in a legit cinema. The image quality? Stellar. With Wifi , I've got a buffet of streaming options at my fingertips. Setting it up? A breeze, even if you're more tech-challenged than a toaster. The built-in speakers? Surprisingly good, but the option to amp up the volume with external ones is a sweet bonus. If you want your living room to turn into an entertainment haven with minimal fuss, this projector is what you're looking for.
